# Appendix

## Table of operators

| Operator | Definition |
| :------: | :--------- |
|    ==    | Equal to                      |
|    !=    | Not equal to                  |
|    >     | Greater than                  |
|    <     | Less than                     |
|    >=    | Greater than or equal to      |
|    <=    | Less than or equal to         |
|  &#448;  | Or                            |
|    &     | And                           |
|    !     | Not                           |
|   %in%   | The subject appears in a list |
| is.na()  | The subject is NA             |
